TopicTitle: Landing Planes on Buildings at the KSC!

Articles.Content:
This is an idea I came up with, I looked around on youtube and havent seen it done before with planes. Only VTOLs... So here is my little video, there is no game audio unfortunately. Error on my part :/

But please watch, enjoy, like and subscribe!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PeLkB1pF6aw&feature=youtu.be

Edited November 22, 2013 by Pinkieseb
No ones posting? C'mon, some critique, suggestions for future videos? Ect?
Just a suggestion--> If you are doing post commentary write some notes about what you did so that your not saying "I don't know what I did next" during the video.

Just a suggestion--> If you are doing post commentary write some notes about what you did so that your not saying "I don't know what I did next" during the video.

Thank you, I will use this in future episodes! Thanks!

I was mislead by the thread title. I thought you were landing intact on all the buildings. Otherwise, the video was great! I agree with Deep Space Kraken.

EDIT: Oh good, you changed the thread title. You should try landing on all of them anyway!
